item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineer with a background in networking and programming. Passionate about Open-source software, programming languages and operating systems. Eager to excel in my career, I’m seeking a position as a systems engineer, and here is my personal cv. My mission is to contribute to the development of future software infrastructure.
